title: Rural areas have darker skies but fewer resources for students interested in astronomy – telescopes in schools can help
description: Helping young people tap into their excitement about the night sky helps them build confidence and opens career pathways they may not have considered before.
content: Helping young people tap into their excitement about the night sky helps them build confidence and opens career pathways they may not have considered before.
